description: Eswatini extends country's State of Emergency takes effect from May 18 to at least June 19.

description: Eswatini "Following the announcement by the South African Government of a lockdown, Government advises that only goods and cargo as well as returning citizens and legal residents will be allowed through our borders"

description: IN Eswatini "There will be restrictions at the border. Swaziland is a landlocked kingdom with borders to South Africa and Mozambique. description: Eswatini " is enforcing a restriction of mass gatherings were the Army Day, Kings Birthday and Easter services are suspended  after March 17."

Eswatini " is enforcing restriction on mass gatherings on all public and private event attracting 50 or more people including Army Day, Good Friday, Easter Services, Kings Birthday, conferences, funerals, weddings, entertainment, sporting activitis. All this events are suspended after March 17" UPDATE: The restriction on mass gatherings is not only on the three national holidays but on all private and public events where are 50 or more people supposed to come

Eswatini is enforcing a restriction of mass gatherings of over 20 people  after March 27. UPDATE: The previous policy restricted gathering of 50 or more, it has been narrowed down to 20 people or more.

"All gatherings in Swaziland (eSwatini) have been banned.Only funerals, with restrictions on numbers of people attending, will be allowed to go ahead. Church and other religious gatherings are banned.A new legal notice was issued on Thursday (7 January 2021). The regulations come into force on 9 January and will be reviewed after 14 days."
